plot: The road to marriage for longtime sweethearts Nchare and Mapon is a difficult one. Nchare moves to his uncle's small village as a teen and meets Mapon. As adults, their engagement is jeopardized by persistent rumors.
title: Mah Sa-Sah
plot_es: The road to marriage for longtime sweethearts Nchare and Mapon is a difficult one. Nchare moves to his uncle's small village as a teen and meets Mapon. As adults, their engagement is jeopardized by persistent rumors.
plot_en: The road to marriage for longtime sweethearts Nchare and Mapon is a difficult one. Nchare moves to his uncle's small village as a teen and meets Mapon. As adults, their engagement is jeopardized by persistent rumors.
